questions: One question that covers the whole content: "How does Tracardi handle workflows?"
Optional questions that cover part of the text:
- "What is the workflow feature offered by Tracardi?"
- "How does Tracardi enable businesses to design processes?"
- "What does Tracardi automate when it comes to customer data?"
answer:
# How does Tracardi handle workflows?
Tracardi offers a workflow feature that enables businesses to design and automate processes involving customer data.
